definitions.definition: A rough, prickly husk around the seeds or fruit of some plants.
Any of several plants having such husks.
A rotary cutting implement having a selection of variously shaped heads.
Alternative form of burr ( “ small piece of material ” ) .

main_definition: A rough, prickly husk around the seeds or fruit of some plants.
secondary_definitions: Any of several plants having such husks.
A rotary cutting implement having a selection of variously shaped heads.
Alternative form of burr ( “ small piece of material ” ) .
